entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Tasuku Honjo is a Japanese physician-scientist and immunologist. 2018 Nobel Prize in Medicine Physiology, known for his identification of programmed cell protein. Said: Coronavirus is not natural because the thermology of viruses.
